Title: DEAD ZONE
Headline: Sea Life Is Suffocating in a 'Dead Zone' the Size of New Jersey
Description: Sea life could be unable to survive in thousands of miles of ocean.
Author: CAROLINE HASKINS

Title: WILD RIDES
Headline: Watch a GoPro Take a Ride Through an Electron Beam Irradiator
Description: Shielded in lead and mounted on a conveyer cart, a GoPro braves the Mercury Plastic NeoBeam.
Author: BECKY FERREIRA

Title: SPEED DAEMONS
Headline: We Went Desert Off-Roading in High-Speed Dune Buggies
Description: Meet the people who build and race the world’s fastest dune-conquering vehicles.
Author: MOTHERBOARD STAFF

Title: SOUNDTRACK TO YOUR LIFE
Headline: Should You Pull a 'Baby Driver' and Use Music to Drown Out Your Tinnitus?
Description: Tinnitus, the chronic ringing in your ears when no sound is present, can be extremely distressing.
Author: KALEIGH ROGERS

Title: BRAVE NEW WORLD
Headline: US Scientists Just Confirmed They’ve Genetically Modified Human Embryos
Description: The researchers want to move onto clinical trials in humans and “monitor the birth of children."
Author: KATE LUNAU

Title: SPYING
Headline: The DEA Met With Controversial iPhone Hackers NSO Group
Description: NSO Group's products have been linked to hacking attempts on journalists, activists, and dissidents.
Author: JOSEPH COX

Title: COMPUTER CHESS
Headline: How Garry Kasparov Learned to Stop Worrying and Love AI
Description: The first chess master to get pwned by an artificial intelligence isn’t worried about AI pwning humanity.
Author: DANIEL OBERHAUS

Title: BRAZIL
Headline: Local Apps Are Letting People Automate Brazil’s Notorious Bureaucracy
Description: Residents spend over 2,000 hours, or over 80 days per person, just to file their taxes every year.
Author: MARINA LOPES

Title: TELEPORTATION
Headline: Does My Body Die If My Brain Teleports From Mars?
Description: A toggle switch allows me to decide whether the ‘old me’ on Mars is preserved or destroyed after I teleport back home.
Author: CHARLIE HUENEMANN
